Pruebanicsens is an application that controls your device's camera through the native C++ library camera2ndk, offering the following functionalities:
 - Displays all available camera resolutions.
 - Captures an image in YUV420 format with the highest available resolution.
 - Enables server mode so that the described actions can be triggered by an HTTP Get request.
 The interface supports English and Spanish languages, and is able to adapt to the device orientation.
